nodes.text: Well, things looked bad when I stumbled into this cave. Thought I was a goner fer sure. Figured it was their lair - but I had me my torch so I went inside. Hoo-wee, it was a deep cave. And that's when I saw it.
Well, there warn't no need to be rude about it. Just wanted a little sip, see. Steady my nerves...
Hell and thunder, you again? Git yer scrawny ass outta my sight!
Easy, pardner! Can't blame a man fer asking, can ya? I'll just leave you be then.
Damn right I am! You don't have a little drink on you, do you now? Fer an old man.
By the time I staggered into Shady Sands, I was mostly dead. Took me to the doc and fixed me up, but that doc stole my map. I knows it and that's all I gots to say.
It was a great big door, like them kinds you see in the old video flics. Big and made o' steel. An on it was carved a great, big 13!
Hoo-wee! Sounds like you got yerself some mighty fine hooch there! Say, hows about sharing a little? Just a little sip.
That's a right fine name, yep. Say, you wouldn't have a drink on ya, pardner?
What'd you say your name was again, stranger? I'm Saltbeef Bob.

They fought like hellcats. I fired so much I melted down my rifle barrel and was going at 'em knife to claw when old Bessie finally fused her last circuit board. Well, I tried to save her, but it warn't no use. Finally had to cut and run, keeping 'em off with rocks all the way.
(Gulp, gulp, gulp) Aaaahhhh! That's right fine of you, stranger! Fine person, indeed. Kind a man should have as his pardner. (Gulp) Did I ever tell you about the time I made my big strike?
Tarnation, it's a good and honest name, is what it is! The boys let me do some cooking around here and if you weren't such a tinhorn you'd know that and know to respect yer elders.
Rile me? Rile me! You ain't seen me riled yet! Now jes' git outta my sight before you gets me really upset! Gwan! Git!
Well bite me, too! Now yer talking. Don't take no lip from nobody, pardner! Say, you got any hooch on ya? Just a little sip?
Hee, hee, hee! It's mine now, pardner. You'll jes' have to find yer own!
I knew I'd found it, the mother lode, the Vault 13. I sat right down and made me a map. Damn near died getting out o' there, past them deathclaws and then the sun o' the desert and no water.

links.text: You're a fiesty one, old timer
Get away from me you stinking bum!
Saltbeef? What kind of name is that?
Get away from me, you stinking bum!
Saltbeef? What kind of name is that?
Hey, quit drinking all my booze!
Sorry, old-timer didn't mean to rile you.
Get away from me you, stinking bum!
